Is it possible to use a currency like BTC or ETH as a PBaaS chain in the Verus Desktop GUI?

No, it is not currently possible to use a currency like BTC or ETH as a PBaaS chain in the Verus Desktop GUI, if that currency is already supported in the Verus Desktop. This is a limitation in the current testnet release, but it will not be a limitation before mainnet availability.

2. (GUI) If a currency is supported in the Verus Desktop already, such as BTC or ETH, you will not be able to use those same named currencies as a PBaaS chain. This limitation is considered errata for this testnet release and will not be a limitation before mainnet availability.# DisclaimerThis is experimental and unfinished software. Use at your own risk!
